name: black hole simulator
desc: This program simulates the effect of a black hole's gravity on light.

name: xor cryptosystem
desc: XOR encryption/decryption using the digest of a custom hash algorithm for the "key". This is simply an experiment, and should not be used to protect actual sensitive information from actual attackers.

name: lagrange chemical fluid simulation
desc: An experiment involving liquids and gels with randomized chemical and physical properties.

name: eulerian fluid simulation
desc: A grid-based fluid simulation with momentum and surface tension.

name: alphabet explosion android app
desc: A very simple app demonstrating Processing's Android mode.

name: circadian tetris
desc: The player doesn't clear pieces directly, but rather waits for when the pieces and spaces invert periodically.

name: rutgercoleg
desc: A *very* silly game that my friends and I threw together for the Fall 2018 HackRU event.
